abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the Second
            Additional Financing for the Emergency Social Action Project
            for Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) is to improve access
            to social services by the poor and enhance management of
            development resources at the community level. Performance
            indicator targets have been updated to reflect the
            additional funds being made available. The additional grant
            will help finance the costs associated with scaling up
            successful activities of a well performing project that has
            led to substantial increase in access to basic social
            services. The activities to be funded comprise: (i)
            rehabilitation and construction of small-scale community
            based infrastructure; (ii) capacity building primarily for
            beneficiary communities and local executing agencies
            involved in project implementation; and (iii) project
            coordination and management. The additional financing will
            target communities in the Seke Banza territory in the
            Bas-Congo province.
